coreAttributes.name: underbust corset
coreAttributes.description: A corset designed to be worn over a shirt and cinch the waist of the wearer, while leaving their breasts and stomach totally exposed. It has a series of laces at the front that are used to tighten it.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the underbust corset under[npc.her] breasts before tying the laces up.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the underbust corset under [npc2.her] breasts before tying the laces up.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the underbust corset under [npc2.her] breasts before roughly tightening the laces up.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc.her] corset's laces and [npc.verb(remove)] it from under [npc.her] breasts.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc2.namePos] corset's laces and [npc.verb(remove)] it from under [npc2.her] breasts.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(undo)] [npc2.namePos] corset's laces and let's it drop to the floor.
